message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's in excellent condition and worth every penny. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the condition of the product, but I can only pay up to $12,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a great deal, but $12,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $13,500, which is still a good deal for both of us. Let's make this happen!
